        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 782x119
          text run at (0,0) width 513: "Here's the HTML test case, extracted from the Netcenter Address Book page. At "
          text run at (513,0) width 261: "the top of the address book is a \"tool bar\""
          text run at (0,20) width 161: "with options like \"New,\" "
          text run at (160,20) width 468: "\"Directory,\" \"Sign-out,\" \"Customize,\" etc. These are areas in a client side "
          text run at (627,20) width 151: "image map. You should"
          text run at (0,40) width 352: "be able to click on these areas of the map, including the "
          text run at (352,40) width 428: "areas on the right side of the map. However, in NGLayout, the right"
          text run at (0,60) width 69: "side of the "
          text run at (69,60) width 454: "map isn't \"clickable\" -- the cursor doesn't change and the link cannot be "
          text run at (523,60) width 78: "\"activated.\" "
          text run at (601,60) width 155: "I think somewhere we're"
          text run at (0,80) width 355: "miscalculating where the imagemap's areas are, because "
          text run at (355,80) width 427: "the areas on the left still work, although clicking on them sometimes"
          text run at (0,100) width 54: "crashes. "
          text run at (54,100) width 442: "It's as though NGLayout thinks the Imagemap areas are located a few "
          text run at (496,100) width 164: "hundred pixels to the left. "
